amendment.description: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 with respect to teacher development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2375 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2375 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Burr. (consideration: CR S9743-9745; text: CR S9743-9744) To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 with respect to teacher development.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2375 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Burr.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2375 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
